file_content.text: This unit = nothing new to report
This unit = awaiting situation report // Query = was Republic presence removed?
Yes.
Completely.
Take a guess, droid.
Situation report = relayed to Command // Dispensation = confirmed + forwarded
This unit = will maintain observation until relieved // Maintenance = expected
Republic camp = still a threat
Ally = Sith // Operator = my lord // This unit = serves my lord
Ally = Imperial // Operator = error: null // This unit = reports to null
Ally = registered combatant // This unit = delegating objectives
This unit = recon // Sector = crystal mine // Threat assessment = Republic forces // Republic forces = ongoing threat to successful occupation // This unit = advises removal
I'll remove it.
This unit = aware of weaknesses // Briefing = compiled + to follow
What needs doing?
So?
Ally = vanguard force // Vanguard = most able to engage
Ambush = maximum confusion + minimized resistance // Tactical assessment = sabotage camp enviro-controls + remove Jedi commanders
Anti-freezing mixture + heat source = toxic // Camp enviro-controls + this unit's coolant reservoir = forced evacuation + disarray
You're suggesting poisoning their climate controls with your coolant to force them out of their camps.
Let's be sure I understand.
Statement = true
Got it.
Coolant reservoir = sealed and ready for removal // This unit = will remain // Orders = await confirmation of target destruction
I'll pass. [Refuse quest]
Acknowledged // This unit = returning to duties
Enemy = present at crystal mine // This unit = advises caution
